#summary Development Road Map for BigBlueButton


= Current Release =

== Release 0.8 ==
Development of !BigBlueButton 0.81 is underway.  The focus is the following features:

  # Capturing all activity in the presentation window for playback
  # Support for students with disabilities

A link to the recording for the committers meeting (held 2012-05-18) that discusses the above features is available here <a href="https://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/browse_thread/thread/e8cf67597405678f">here</a>.


While we don't give out release dates (we release on quality, not dates), you can tell when we enter our testing phase (and getting close to a release) by subscribing to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/topics?gvc=2 bigbluebutton-dev] mailing list.

= Roadmap to !BigBlueButton 1.0 =

To get a look at the plans beyond the current iteration, see [RoadMap1dot0 Roadmap to BigBlueButton 1.0].

= Previous Releases =

== Release 0.71 ==
!BigBlueButton 0.71 was released on November 9, 2010.  You can see a full list of what has been added in the [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/wiki/ReleaseNotes Release Notes].

You can read the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/browse_thread/thread/6ffa48133ea7d2e6# minutes of the committers meeting] on 0.71.


== Release 0.7 ==
!BigBlueButton 0.7 was released on July 15, 2010.  You can see a full list of what has been added in the [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/wiki/ReleaseNotes Release Notes].

You can see the original planning document for 0.7 in the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/browse_thread/thread/33c2080e30fb5f02# Minutes from BigBlueButton committers meeting 2010-04-27].  


To see the results of previous releases, see [ReleaseNotes BigBlueButton Release Notes].
